• This is the first choice due to least risk of uterine hyperstimulation:
• Pass a Foley catheter with 30 mL bulb through cervix with sterile technique using a speculum or digital vaginal

amination.
• Inflate bulb with 50 mL water or sodium chloride 0.9%.
